scripts.build: mkdir -p public && npm run build:css && npm run build:extra-css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:extra-css: for f in src/*.css; do [ "$f" != "src/input.css" ] && npx cleancss -o public/$(basename $f) $f; done
scripts.build:js: for f in src/*.js; do npx terser $f -o public/$(basename $f) -c -m; done
scripts.build:html: for f in src/*.html; do npx html-minifier-terser $f -o public/$(basename $f) --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true; done
